titleStmt.title: The thinges vvhich happened vpon the Prince of Parmas retire since the 20. of Nouembre, till the 27. of the same moneth With the newes from dauphine. Published by authority.
Ce qui est advenu en la retraicte du duc de Parme dupuis le 20 Novembre jusques au 27. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, for Andrew White, and are to be sold at his shop at the Royall Exchange, ouer against the conduit in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: Page following the first page 5 is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Royall Exchange, ouer against the conduit in Cornehill
